title: Variables and Basic Data Types
code:
x = 5  # integer
name = 'Alice'  # string
is_active = True  # boolean
pi = 3.14  # float
x = 'extra'  # now x is a string
explanation: Demonstrates how to create variables with different data types: integer, string, boolean, and float. Python variables are dynamically typed, meaning you don't declare their type explicitly and can reassign variables to different types, as shown with variable 'x'.
